definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: zhong1 du4 xing4 fei4 shui3 zhong3

sentences.english: Maternal pulmonary oedema has been reported with tocolysis and fluid overload.
sentences.chinese: 资料显示孕妇肺水肿并伴随液体超负荷与安胎。

sentences.english: The lymphoedema of the right lower limb gradually subsided with softening of the skin after operation.
sentences.chinese: 右下肢的淋巴水肿在手术后逐渐改善并且皮肤变软。

sentences.english: The intima was hyperplastic and edematous and consequently the vessel lumen became narrower or was obstructed.
sentences.chinese: 血管内膜增生及水肿，并造成血管狭窄或阻塞。

sentences.english: Position child with head of bed slightly elevated to decrease cerebral edema; monitor administration of fluids.
sentences.chinese: 卧床时，床头略微抬高，减少脑水肿，监视补液情况。

sentences.english: The prevention and control of edema disease of swine were reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对猪水肿病的发病机制及防治措施进行了综述。

sentences.english: Conclusion The victim died suddenly after a person being untied because the cerebral e…
sentences.chinese: 结论受害者松绑后即死主要是脑水肿即刻加重的结果。

sentences.english: Evaluate the anti-action of Aprotinin in ischemic brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 评价抑肽酶对缺血性脑水肿的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Result All patients were successful, 1 case had ever pulmonary edema.
sentences.chinese: 结果患者全部获治成功，1例曾出现肺水肿。

sentences.english: Merge the brain contusion and laceration more to harm or after the hair brain dropsy, the condition aggravate.
sentences.chinese: 多合并脑挫裂伤或者继发性脑水肿，病情加重。

sentences.english: Villous edema and trophoblast of cell proliferation without clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛水肿和滋养叶细胞增生无临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of mannitol on brain edema after cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨甘露醇对脑出血后脑水肿的影响。

sentences.english: High Altitude Pulmonary Edema(HAPE) is an altitude idiopathic disease which causes fatal risk.
sentences.chinese: 高原性肺水肿是一种具有致命危险的高原特发病。

sentences.english: They can also promote urination and reduce edema.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可以促进排尿，减少水肿。

sentences.english: Lymphedema is characterized by a regional accumulation of excessive amounts of interstitial protein-rich fluid.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴水肿的特点是过量间质性富蛋白液的局部积聚。

sentences.english: Nimodipine can inhibit the formation of brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 尼莫地平有干预脑水肿形成的作用。

sentences.english: Scrotal and pedal edema occur in advanced cases (Fig. 148–4).
sentences.chinese: 阴囊和足部水肿出现在更进一步的病例中。

definition: clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
